error.voxeltools.disabled: This item has been disabled by your server administrator.
error.voxeltools.noPermission: You do not have permission to use this item.
config.voxeltools.allowItemUse.tooltip: Enables/disables the functionality of all items.
config.voxeltools.defaultPermLevel.toolt: The default permission level of the permission [voxeltools.item], which grants players access to VoxelTools.
config.voxeltools.jackhammerNoPhys.toolt: Whether to use no-physics mode for either mouse button, both, or neither.
config.voxeltools.allowOverwrite.tooltip: Whether to allow block-moving items (ie Graviton Sledge) to destroy blocks in their way when the player is sneaking.
config.voxeltools.paintbrushRange.toolti:
The range of the paintbrush when remotely painting a block.
Anything below the player's reach distance (default 5) will disable remote painting.
config.voxeltools.shovel.digRadiusX: Auto-Shoveler 9001's Dig Radius on the X axis
config.voxeltools.shovel.digRadiusX.tool: The radius of the shovel's dig ability on the X axis. Set to 0 to disable.
config.voxeltools.shovel.digRadiusY: Auto-Shoveler 9001's Dig Radius on the Y axis
config.voxeltools.shovel.digRadiusY.tool: The radius of the shovel's dig ability on the Y axis. Set to 0 to disable.
config.voxeltools.shovel.digRadiusZ: Auto-Shoveler 9001's Dig Radius on the Z axis
config.voxeltools.shovel.digRadiusZ.tool: The radius of the shovel's dig ability on the Z axis. Set to 0 to disable.
config.voxeltools.shovel.flattenRadius.t: The radius of the shovel's flatten ability. Set to 0 to disable.
config.voxeltools.shovel.flattenHeight.t:
The height of the shovel's flatten ability.
Set to 1 to only flatten blocks on the same horizontal plane.
config.voxeltools.shovel.flattenHeightOf:
The shovel's flatten ability's height offset from the block clicked.
A value of 0 is the plane of the block clicked, and 'n' is the plane 'n' blocks above the block.
config.voxeltools.chainsaw.cutRadius.too: The radius of the chainsaw's cutting (trees) ability. Set to 0 to disable.
config.voxeltools.chainsaw.cleanRadius.t: The radius of the chainsaw's cleaning (vegetation in general) ability. Set to 0 to disable.
